mapper.select: INSERT INTO company ( company_name, company_number, company_status, company_location, date_of_creation, company_authority, termination_date ) VALUES ( #{companyName}, #{companyNumber}, #{companyStatus}, #{companyLocation}, #{dateOfCreation}, #{companyAuthority}, #{terminationDate} ) ON CONFLICT (company_number) DO UPDATE SET company_name = EXCLUDED.company_name, company_status = EXCLUDED.company_status, company_location = EXCLUDED.company_location, date_of_creation = EXCLUDED.date_of_creation, company_authority = EXCLUDED.company_authority, termination_date = EXCLUDED.termination_date RETURNING *;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO termination (termination_date, termination_registration_number, termination_description, company_id) VALUES (#{terminationDate}, #{terminationRegistrationNumber}, #{terminationDescription}, #{companyId}) ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING

INSERT INTO tax_info (tax_registration_number, date_of_registration, tax_payer_type, tax_authority_id, company_id) VALUES (#{taxRegistrationNumber}, #{dateOfRegistration}, #{taxPayerType}, #{taxAuthorityId}, #{companyId}) ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING
